website_summaries.verdict: Designed for maximizing core workouts with pull-up bars.
pros: Great for knee raises, crossovers, and straight-leg raises
Holds up well with heavy user weight
cons: Test out the fit first as it may rub the wrong way

customer_reviews.title: Ripped out in less than 30 days
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in January 2019, and I've used them maybe 12 - 15 times since getting them. I really liked them at first, but today when I was using them, one of them completely ripped out without any warning. I'm glad I wasn't using them to support my entire body weight, which is just above 200 lbs, so it's not like I'm over loading them, and there's no weight limit listed for them that I've been able to find. Update 2/7/2019 - Customer Service has been great, and has shipped out a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Vianco

customer_reviews.title: they work
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as an accessory to my pull up bar, specifically to do leg-raises. I weigh about 180# and this holds up just fine & is comfortable on my arms.
customer_reviews.author: b wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: No pressure!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a couple of years now and they work great. I didn't think I would actually need them but they are awesome. I use these with the pull up bar for ab workouts. When hanging from these straps, Chin ups are so much easier because they take all the weight off your arms. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Obunga

customer_reviews.title: Fully adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Adjustable to provide maximum support to all heights and weights
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: Great value, these straps work as well as the more expensive types. Being close to 300 lbs I wasn't sure if these would hold up. I'm able to achieve the same work out at home as I would have at the gym. They're not as "heavy duty" as some others but as a single user they don't have to be. As for the long term the week point will be the Velcro, we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Joe LaRue

customer_reviews.title: Quality constructed.
customer_reviews.text: An add on for my son's pull up bar, I figured he might get more use out of the bar. Bar get's used daily, the straps not so much. I think as time goes on, he might put it into more practice. He keeps them on the bar nested inside of each other, doesn't block the doorway. A quick pull and they are ready to use. Individual use will vary, but glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Cashew

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, don't even think twice, they're worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I was considering these ab straps vs some other more expensive ones and went with these based on the good reviews. They're awesome! Yes, I received two and yes, they're Velcro, which might not seem like it would hold 205 lbs very well, but in practice they work just fine. Overall, I'm very pleased and can't believe I got quality Ab Straps at this price. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Matt M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a few days ago with my newly acquired Amazon Prime account and everyday when I go home during my lunch break from work, I spend a solid ten minutes doing knee raises on my pull up bar. I was skeptical when first seeing them because of the velcro, but they hold pretty well and I'm 6'0 180. Great product to use when you want to add a kick to your abs and lower back.
customer_reviews.author: Jchilltopper

customer_reviews.title: Just what I thought.
customer_reviews.text: These straps are no-nonsense and to-the-point. Nothing fancy, but adequate. They are adjustable with heavy velcro. I am an average-sized woman, and I see these being very useful and durable to me for quite a while. (I can't say whether these would be durable for a 200+ lb person or someone larger than me, but they are very simple and will likely be strong enough, especially if you hold on to the pullup bar as well as let these take most of the weight off your hands.) All in all, for ten bucks, I'm very pleased. For something I'll only use a couple of times a week, and serves its function well this is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Circuit Maker

customer_reviews.title: Functional.  Bad smell.
customer_reviews.text: Functionally, these work just fine. They support my weight easily (175 lbs) and once you have the straps adjusted, they stay at that same length. CON: They stink, literally. After a few months, they started giving off this acrid chemical smell. It's not B.O., or from any other natural source. I think the foam inside the straps has started to degrade.
customer_reviews.author: AJB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome addition to my ab workouts
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried that they just lock together with velcro but i must say it held up just fine, held my weight with no problems. Im 200lbs
customer_reviews.author: davidk

customer_reviews.title: If it says Ultimate, it's Ultimate.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Getting adjusted to be 100% even on both sides is easy enough. Bought "used" but they were brand new just not in original packaging. I can live with saving a couple bucks.
customer_reviews.author: ymerej

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price...
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these for my son for years. I usually replace them within 2 to 3 years. He uses them 3 times a week on average.
customer_reviews.author: V Shipley

customer_reviews.title: They're $20 and they feel like they're $20
customer_reviews.text: They're $20 and they feel like they're $20. These aren't the most comfortable straps made, but they do their job and are priced right.
customer_reviews.author: G. Levy

customer_reviews.title: going strong
customer_reviews.text: These have been hanging up outside on my pull up bar forever and they still are going strong. Well made product, works perfectly well and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kellen in Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: but it's nice to stretch out the back every so often
customer_reviews.text: Haven't seen any "huge" changes in my mid-section as a result of using this, but it's nice to stretch out the back every so often.
customer_reviews.author: S. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Worked great and was able to add several more Ab exercise ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to go with my Pull/Chin bar to include more Ab exercises in my routine. Worked great and was able to add several more Ab exercise like I wanted to. Great Price also.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce A. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product!!! I am using them in the middle east during a deployment and they are stable and durable
customer_reviews.author: Chief

customer_reviews.title: Great support!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a problem yet thus far and feels perfectly comfortable in any circumstance. This is just what I needed for my workouts!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Celis

customer_reviews.title: I like it much it's helped me too much hanging abs ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it much it's helped me too much hanging abs exercise
customer_reviews.author: nezar alo ali

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are minimal, yet, very crunch straps to attached to eye bolts. They hold 240lbs without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Glad that I bought
customer_reviews.text: I use these on my doorway pull-up bar. They work great. They are comfortable on my arms (I am 5'4" and 138 pounds) They stay on securely. Definitely able to add ab work now!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Eakins

customer_reviews.title: Love These!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great tool to have for your body press! They help your abs tighten up, and help you focus on your lower back and abs!
customer_reviews.author: Delecty A. Prosence

customer_reviews.title: simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: Stable (I weight 180lbs), adjustable, no carabiners just Velcro. I feel the burn after a quick session...and hanging seems good for my back.
customer_reviews.author: vtwakeboarder

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome!!! no pinching. Quality is good and they are more narrow than some brands which aids in the no pinching the backside of the arm.
customer_reviews.author: Leaza

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Nothing much to say. Adjustable to pretty much any length and has no problem comfortably supporting me for hanging crunches. I am kinda a smaller guy (150 lbs) but they seem more than capable of holding much more weight.
customer_reviews.author: kocgolf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Straps are great for someone who weighs more than 150lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Grady

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They're fine; they do the job of enabling you to do leg raises off of the pull up bar.
customer_reviews.author: HAndrew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good. A little fray but it's still up to good use.
customer_reviews.author: James Brown

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: i gave it five stars b/c im completely satisfied with the product. at first though, i thought my arms were hurting because of the straps but as keep doing more and more reps i found out that i just have weak arms and no muscle strength LOL... other than that i recommend this for anyone .
customer_reviews.author: Linda Pena

customer_reviews.title: At first I was skeptic, now I am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptic at first when comparing other products similar to this one. Some of the similar products were more than double in price than this one. When this product arrived the straps were easy to attach (velcro) and offered appropriate comfort and support for working out. More than anything, I am impressed of how well the velcro straps work, versus the typical carabiner clips. If you own a pullup bar, I recommend this product to complete your workout.
customer_reviews.author: MrBlindPenguin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install. Now to build some solid abs.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 155 and it holds me up just fine. I'm doing more ab movements that I never knew I could do before.
customer_reviews.author: jwin

customer_reviews.title: Work Great
customer_reviews.text: They work great once you get them adjusted to the right length. I had a hard time finding ab straps with velcro so I didn't have to hold them while doing hanging leg raises, but these have solved that problem.
customer_reviews.author: ZandSCoston

customer_reviews.title: Straps appear to be good quality
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been able to use them yet, because my house was struck by lightning last week and I've been dealling with the local electric company, almost non-stop, on getting the repairs taken care of. I'm looking forward to using them though, after this electric issue is finalized.
customer_reviews.author: PhotoFXusa

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: They're not exactly comfortable but they'll do for the price. I've only used them by wrapping them around the bar of the smith machine at my gym and they work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Brock

customer_reviews.title: Works as they should.
customer_reviews.text: Works as they should. Took a bit to get the sizing right but once you get it they work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: gooooood!!
customer_reviews.text: good. job!! I use this goods for. hanging reg raises,hanging knee raise , hanging knee to chest.by this goods ,I can do it easily.
customer_reviews.author: toru adachi

customer_reviews.title: Where were the TWO straps???
customer_reviews.text: Hmmm...photo shows 2 ab straps, it's advertised as "Ultimate Body Press Ab STRAPS"....I only received one strap, and it was ripped. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy material, very uncomfortable on your arms while hanging. They need more padding, wouldn't recommend if you plan on doing a lot of reps and sets.
customer_reviews.author: mdragonpalm

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete
customer_reviews.text: The Amazon Ad stated ' set of abstraps' so I ordered it. All I received was one strap not the 2 as it was advertised. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: DocB

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, useful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use with our Ultimate Body Press Wall-Mounted Pull Up Bar, and they work well. They're lightweight and appear very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Love2Read

customer_reviews.title: good price. good quality.
customer_reviews.text: been using these for over a year now. heavy duty velcro doesn't make me worry i will go boom! i just slip them off my pull up bar when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: John B

product_meta.title: Ultimate Body Press Ab Straps
product_meta.description: Ultimate Body Press Hanging Knee Raise Ab Straps develop a powerful core and slim waist fast. Ab Straps eliminate the need to hang from your hands while performing hanging knee raises - the best exercise for your abs. The key to Ultimate Body Press Ab Straps are the sectional foam padding and adjustable loop size. Greater comfort lets you maintain your workout intensity longer for incredible effectiveness. Extra wide velcro lets you adjust each loop for a custom fit. Use the Ab Straps with wall mounted pull up bars, chin up/dip stations and doorway pull up bars. After your first set of hanging knee raises you will feel the results and you will be hooked.
feature_bullets: Sectional foam padded lower section for more comfort
Extra wide Velcro upper section for a better fit
Ab Straps are great for hanging knee raises, crossovers and straight leg raises
